title: Culture: People (Usefulness 1)
description: Traveler usefulness 1/10 phrases for the People subcategory within Culture. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: It is often said that people in Osaka are generally very friendly and kind.
cards.romaji: .saka no hito wa, shitashimiyasukute shinsetsu da to iwarete imasu.
cards.japanese: 大阪の人は、親しみやすくて親切だと言われています。
